testcase.name: Test 4: Confirm changes not saved if cancel button is clicked
Test 5: Employee card changes saved after errors are fixed
Test 6: Verify that inputs filled incorrectly have red underline represent by class name .invalidInfo which is added
Test 7: Search Input by Name will not return any employees if no employee matches the search input text
Test 8: Filtering search input by Name will return an employee if an employee name matches the text entered
Test 9: Verify that changes made on an employee card persist even when user closes window and opens the application in a new browser session
Test 10: Verifies that all employee cards will load and be visible after the clear button next to the search employees button is clicked
